title: Order Status
content: How do I check my order status? You can check your order status by logging into your account and navigating to 'My Orders'. The system updates the status in real-time. Can I cancel an order? Orders can be cancelled within 2 hours of placement.

title: Returns and Refunds
content: What is the return policy? You can return most items within 30 days of delivery. How do I request a refund? Initiate a refund through your account portal, and it will be processed within 5-7 business days. Are there any items that cannot be returned? Yes, perishable goods and personalized items cannot be returned.

title: Shipping Information
content: What are the shipping options? We offer standard, express, and overnight shipping. How long does shipping take? Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days, express 2-3 business days. Can I track my shipment? Yes, tracking is available via your order page.

title: Payment Options
content: What payment methods are accepted? We accept credit/debit cards, net banking, UPI, and digital wallets. Can I pay using multiple methods? Currently, split payments are not supported. Is it safe to store my payment info? Yes, we use industry-standard encryption for all transactions.

title: Account Management
content: How do I reset my password? Click 'Forgot Password' and follow the instructions. How can I delete my account? Contact support to request account deletion. Can I update my email or phone number? Yes, navigate to 'Profile Settings' and update your contact info.

title: Product Information
content: Where can I find product manuals? Manuals are available under the product details section. Are there warranties on products? Most products come with a one-year warranty. How do I check if a product is in stock? Stock status is displayed on the product page.

title: Technical Support
content: How do I contact support? Use the 'Help & Support' page or chat with our bot. What is the response time? Typically within 24 hours. Do you offer troubleshooting guides? Yes, guides are available for most common issues online.

title: Promotions and Discounts
content: How do I apply a promo code? Enter the code at checkout. Are promo codes stackable? No, only one promo code can be applied per order. How do I know about new offers? Subscribe to our newsletter or follow our social media.

title: International Orders
content: Do you ship internationally? Yes, we ship to select countries. Are there additional charges? Customs duties and taxes may apply. How long does international shipping take? Usually 10-20 business days depending on the destination.

title: Returns for Damaged Products
content: What if I receive a damaged product? Contact support immediately with photos. Can I exchange it? Yes, we will replace damaged items at no extra cost. How fast is the replacement? Usually within 5-7 business days.
